title: Requirements Gathering for Floating Offshore Wind Farm System
description: Identify and document the functional and non-functional requirements of the floating offshore wind farm system. This task includes gathering input from relevant stakeholders such as wind turbine manufacturers, electrical engineers, marine engineers, and software developers (for automation and control systems). The goal is to ensure a comprehensive understanding of system requirements for effective design and implementation.

title: Design Concept for Floating Offshore Wind Turbines
description: Develop a conceptual design for the floating wind turbines that can be deployed in deep offshore waters.
dependencies: Requirements Gathering for Floating Offshore Wind Farm System

title: Detailed Design of Floating Offshore Wind Turbine Structure
description: Create a detailed design for the structure of the floating wind turbines, including materials, dimensions, and engineering specifications.
dependencies: Design Concept for Floating Offshore Wind Turbines

title: Electrical Systems Design for Floating Offshore Wind Farm
description: Develop the electrical systems design for the floating offshore wind farm, including the turbine generator, power distribution, and grid connection.
dependencies: Design Concept for Floating Offshore Wind Turbines

title: Mechanical Systems Design for Floating Offshore Wind Farm
description: Create the mechanical systems design for the floating offshore wind farm, including bearings, hydraulics, and control systems.
dependencies: Design Concept for Floating Offshore Wind Turbines

title: Software Architecture Design for Floating Offshore Wind Farm
description: Develop the software architecture design for the monitoring, control, and communication systems of the floating offshore wind farm.
dependencies: Design Concept for Floating Offshore Wind Turbines

title: Implementation of Floating Offshore Wind Farm System Components
description: Develop the individual components of the floating offshore wind farm system, including turbine generators, electrical systems, mechanical systems, and control software.
dependencies: Detailed Design of Floating Offshore Wind Turbine Structure
Electrical Systems Design for Floating Offshore Wind Farm
Mechanical Systems Design for Floating Offshore Wind Farm
Software Architecture Design for Floating Offshore Wind Farm

title: Integration and Testing of Floating Offshore Wind Farm System Components
description: Integrate the individual components of the floating offshore wind farm system, test for functionality, compatibility, and performance.
dependencies: Implementation of Floating Offshore Wind Farm System Components

title: Deployment and Installation of Floating Offshore Wind Farm
description: Plan, coordinate, and execute the deployment and installation of the floating offshore wind farm system in a deep-sea location. This task includes preliminary site surveys, equipment preparation, coordination with logistics, and supervision during the installation process.
dependencies: Integration and Testing of Floating Offshore Wind Farm System Components
